summary: My own preset with which I play, Nordic race
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/InKZxXj.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Zxh4My7.png[/img]

[color=#980000][size=3]☆[/size][/color] Hello, first of all, it goes without saying that my native language is not English so I hope I can express myself well. This is the first mod that I go. It adds the character that I play for your game thanks to racemenu mod. The character is a male Nordic with blue eyes, long beard and head shaved at the sides. If you do not like the hair or beard you can always change it easily by racemenu.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/OTqZcWp.png[/img]

[color=#ff7700][size=3]◥◣ OPTION 1: NMM Installation[/size]
[/color]
▣ Just download and install the mod via NMM [color=#000000][size=4]☺[/size][/color]
[color=#ff7700][size=3]
◥◣ OPTION 2: Manual installation
[/size][/color]
The installation of racemenu preset is very easy, just follow the steps:

▣ Go to folder called ''Presets'' in your game installarion folder  [color=#351c75]►[/color]   [color=#f4cccc][size=1]C:\program files (x86)\steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\SKSE\plugins\CharGen\Presets[/size][/color]
[size=2]and paste my preset file.

[/size][color=#ff7700][size=3]◥◣ RECOMENDED MODS:[/size][/color]
[size=2]▣ [/size]You need to install these mods to make your character look like my screenshots!

◈ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url]

◈ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows
[/url]
◈ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards
[/url]
◈ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]

◈ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Race Menu[/url]

◈ [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender[/url]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/xOk9siY.png[/img]

[color=#f4cccc] v 1.0 [/color][color=#cfe2f3]Initial release.[/color]

[color=#cfe2f3][img]http://i.imgur.com/Vd6S9h2.png[/img]
[/color]
[color=#fff2cc][size=4]○[/size][/color][color=#d9ead3] Mod made by[/color] [font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]◥[/size][size=4]Lorkarion◣[/size]

[size=2][color=#fff2cc]○ [/color]Thanks to [color=#000000]Bethesda[/color] for making a sublime game.

[color=#fff2cc]○ [/color]Thanks to the authors of the mods I have recommended.[/size][/font]
author: Lorkarion
